# Component Library Installation Examples

**Last Updated**: December 22, 2025

> **Note**: See `SKILL.md` for implementation instructions and decision tree.

## Package.json Format

The component library uses npm alias format:
```json
{
  "dependencies": {
    "@royalaholddelhaize/pdl-spectrum-component-library-web": "npm:@RoyalAholdDelhaize/pdl-spectrum-component-library-web@^{version}"
  }
}
```

**Manual installation**: `npm install @RoyalAholdDelhaize/pdl-spectrum-component-library-web`

**Console Output**:
```
‚úì GitHub authentication configured in ~/.npmrc
‚úì Component library configured: @royalaholddelhaize/pdl-spectrum-component-library-web ‚Üí npm:@RoyalAholdDelhaize/pdl-spectrum-component-library-web@^{latest_version}
‚úì Project .npmrc will be generated by npmrc skill
```

**Result**: Component library added to dependencies using npm alias format, project `.npmrc` generated with registry configuration
{
  "include_component_library": "yes"
}
```

**Prerequisites**: `~/.npmrc` exists with GitHub token

**Console Output**:
```
‚úì GitHub authentication configured in ~/.npmrc
‚úì Component library configured: @RoyalAholdDelhaize/pdl-spectrum-component-library-web@^{latest_version}
‚úì Project .npmrc will be generated by npmrc skill
```

**Result**: Component library added to dependencies, project `.npmrc` generated with registry configuration

---

## Example 2: Token Missing - User Skips

**Scenario**: User requests component library but token not configured, chooses to skip

**Configuration**:
```json
{
  "include_component_library": "yes"
}
```

**Prerequisites**: `~/.npmrc` MISSING

**Console Output**:
```
‚ö†Ô∏è  GitHub token not found in ~/.npmrc
üìñ Setup instructions: https://docs.github.com/en/packages/...
Skip component library installation? (yes/no): yes
‚úì Skipping component library installation
```

**Result**: Component library NOT added to dependencies, no project `.npmrc` generated

---

## Example 3: Token Missing - User Continues

**Scenario**: User requests component library but token not configured, chooses to continue

**Configuration**:
```json
{
  "include_component_library": "yes"
}
**Console Output**:
```
‚ö†Ô∏è  GitHub token not found in ~/.npmrc
üìñ Setup instructions: https://docs.github.com/en/packages/...
Skip component library installation? (yes/no): no
‚ö†Ô∏è  Continuing with installation. Please configure token before running npm install.

‚úì Component library configured: @royalaholddelhaize/pdl-spectrum-component-library-web ‚Üí npm:@RoyalAholdDelhaize/pdl-spectrum-component-library-web@^{latest_version}
‚úì Project .npmrc will be generated by npmrc skill
```

**Result**: Component library added to dependencies using npm alias format, project `.npmrc` generated

**‚ö†Ô∏è Important**: User must configure `~/.npmrc` before running `npm install`, otherwise installation will fail with 401 error.

**Console Output**:
```
‚ö†Ô∏è  GitHub token not found in ~/.npmrc
üìñ Setup instructions: https://docs.github.com/en/packages/...
Skip component library installation? (yes/no): no
‚ö†Ô∏è  Continuing with installation. Please configure token before running npm install.

‚úì Component library configured: @RoyalAholdDelhaize/pdl-spectrum-component-library-web@^{latest_version}
‚úì Project .npmrc will be generated by npmrc skill
```

**Result**: Component library added to dependencies, project `.npmrc` generated

**‚ö†Ô∏è Important**: User must configure `~/.npmrc` before running `npm install`, otherwise installation will fail with 401 error.
